name: Birloon
description:
Made for Ludum Dare 46 Game Compo

Story:
A little girl hands slipted while holding onto a shiny red balloon.
You must now play as the balloon to guide into through an unnaturally amount of birds in the sky.
Have long can you last.

Gameplay:
Your mouse cursor holds onto the string of the balloon.
You must drag the balloon around to avoid birds flying in the sky.
If the body of the balloon touches a bird, it will pop and it's game over from there.
The balloon will natutally try and float upwards.
There is heavy wind, indicated by the top left corner.
The text tells you how fast the wind is, and how much it will influence the balloon.
The arrow tells you the direction of the wind, and the direction the ballon is influenced.

Tools Used:
Game Engine: Unity
Art: Krita
Sound Effects: Bfxr
Music: Bosca Ceoil

Youtube Channel: ttps://www.youtube.com/channel/UCHPJKhlQsQGtzJyGTY80OIg
